112  void build(size_t index, std::vector<size_t>::iterator begin,
113  std::vector<size_t>::iterator end, size_t* split_dims,
114  int t, int D) {
115  if (index >= n) { // create leaf
116  size_t leaf_index = index - n;
117  for (std::vector<size_t>::iterator it = begin; it < end; ++it)
118  leaves[leaf_index].push_back(*it);
119  return;
120  } else { // create node
121  int split_dim = random(t - 1);
122 
123 // std::cout << "before median init\n";
124 // for (std::vector<size_t>::iterator it = begin; it < end; ++it)
125 // std::cout << *it << " ";
126 // std::cout << "\nbefore median done\n" << std::endl;
127 
128  // median holds the index of the point that is the median in
129  // 'split_dims[split_dim]' dimension
130  std::vector<size_t>::iterator median = find_median(
131  *points, begin, end, ((end - begin) / 2), split_dims[split_dim],
132  D);
133 
134 // std::cout << "median = " << *median << "\n";
135 // for (std::vector<size_t>::iterator it = begin; it < end; ++it)
136 // std::cout << *it << " ";
137 // std::cout << std::endl;
138 // std::cout << "split dim = " << split_dim << std::endl;
139 // std::cout << "split_dims[split_dim] = " << split_dims[split_dim]
140 // << std::endl;
141 // std::cout << "cut value = " <<
142 // (*points)[*median*D + split_dims[split_dim]]
143 // << std::endl << std::endl;
144 
145  //float diameter = find_diameter_appr(*points, begin, end, D);
146  //float diameter = find_diameter_exact(*points, begin, end, D);
147  //std::cout << "DIAMETER_appr = " << diameter << "\n";
148  //float bound = (3 * diameter)/sqrt(D);
149  //float delta = random<float>(-bound, bound);
150  //std::cout << "delta = " << delta << ", bound = " << bound << "\n";
151 
152  // Note that indexing is of the form: [i * D + j]
153  nodes[index] = {split_dims[split_dim],
154  (*points)[*median*D + split_dims[split_dim]] /*+delta*/};
155 
156  build(2 * index + 1, begin, begin + (median - begin), split_dims, t, D);
157  build(2 * index + 2, begin + (median - begin), end, split_dims, t, D);
158  }
159  }

174  void printNodes() {
175  for (size_t i = 0; i < nodes.size(); ++i)
176  std::cout << nodes[i].first << " " << nodes[i].second << "\n";
177  }

182  void printLeaves() {
183  for (size_t i = 0; i < leaves.size(); ++i) {
184  std::cout << "\n" << i << "-th leaf: ";
185  for (size_t j = 0; j < nmax; ++j) {
186  std::cout << leaves[i][j] << " ";
187  }
188  }
189  std::cout << "\nDone printing leaves\n";
190  }
191 
196  void printLeavesPoints() {
197  for (size_t i = 0; i < leaves.size(); ++i) {
198  std::cout << "\n" << i << "-th leaf: ";
199  for (size_t j = 0; j < nmax; ++j) {
200  std::cout << "\n";
201  for (size_t k = 0; k < D; ++k) {
202  std::cout << (*points)[leaves[i][j] * D + k] << " ";
203  }
204  }
205  }
206  std::cout << "\nDone printing leaves\n";
207  }
208 
222  void nn(size_t index, const std::vector<FT>& q_rot, const std::vector<FT>& q,
223  const float& mul_factor, std::vector <std::pair<float,
224  int> >& res, int& c, const int max_leaf_check,
225  std::unordered_set<size_t>& vis) {
226  if(c == max_leaf_check)
227  return;
228  if (index >= n) {
229  ++c;
230  // leaf
231  size_t point_index, leaf_index = index - n;
232  float dist;
233  for (size_t j = 0; j < leaves[leaf_index].size(); ++j) {
234  // leaves[i][j] gives you the index of the j-th point,
235  // located in the i-th leaf.
236  // (*points)[leaves[leaf_index][j]] is where the first
237  // coordinate of the point described above lies.
238  point_index = leaves[leaf_index][j] * D;
239  if(vis.find(point_index) != vis.end()) {
240  continue;
241  }
242  vis.insert(point_index);
243  dist = Eucl_distance(*points, point_index, point_index + D, q);
244  dist *= mul_factor;
245 
246  if (dist < res.front().first) {
247  std::pop_heap (res.begin(), res.end());
248  res.pop_back();
249  res.push_back({dist, leaves[leaf_index][j]});
250  std::push_heap (res.begin(), res.end());
251  }
252  }
253  } else {
254  // node
255  if (q_rot[nodes[index].first] < nodes[index].second) {
256  // go to left child
257  nn(2 * index + 1, q_rot, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, vis);
258  //std::cout << "f " << q_rot[nodes[index].first] << " "
259  // << best << " " << nodes[index].second << "\n";
260  if (q_rot[nodes[index].first] + res.front().first >= nodes[index].second) {
261  nn(2 * index + 2, q_rot, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, vis);
262  }
263  } else {
264  // go to right child
265  nn(2 * index + 2, q_rot, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, vis);
266  //std::cout << "s " << q_rot[nodes[index].first] << " "
267  // << best << " " << nodes[index].second << "\n";
268  if (q_rot[nodes[index].first] - res.front().first < nodes[index].second) {
269  nn(2 * index + 1, q_rot, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, vis);
270  }
271  }
272  }
273  }
274 
287  void nn(size_t index, const std::vector<FT>& q, const float& mul_factor,
288  std::vector <std::pair<float, int> >& res, int& c,
289  const int max_leaf_check, std::unordered_set<size_t>& vis) {
290  if(c == max_leaf_check)
291  return;
292  if (index >= n) {
293  ++c;
294  // leaf
295  size_t point_index, leaf_index = index - n;
296  float dist;
297  for (size_t j = 0; j < leaves[leaf_index].size(); ++j) {
298  // leaves[i][j] gives you the index of the j-th point,
299  // located in the i-th leaf.
300  // (*points)[leaves[leaf_index][j]] is where the first
301  // coordinate of the point described above lies.
302  point_index = leaves[leaf_index][j] * D;
303  if(vis.find(point_index) != vis.end()) {
304  continue;
305  }
306  vis.insert(point_index);
307  dist = Eucl_distance(*points, point_index, point_index + D, q);
308  dist *= mul_factor;
309 
310  if (dist < res.front().first) {
311  std::pop_heap (res.begin(), res.end());
312  res.pop_back();
313  res.push_back({dist, leaves[leaf_index][j]});
314  std::push_heap (res.begin(), res.end());
315  }
316  }
317  } else {
318  // node
319  if (q[nodes[index].first] < nodes[index].second) {
320  // go to left child
321  nn(2 * index + 1, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, vis);
322  if (q[nodes[index].first] + res.front().first >= nodes[index].second) {
323  nn(2 * index + 2, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, vis);
324  }
325  } else {
326  // go to right child
327  nn(2 * index + 2, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, vis);
328  if (q[nodes[index].first] - res.front().first < nodes[index].second) {
329  nn(2 * index + 1, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, vis);
330  }
331  }
332  }
333  }
334 
345  void search_nn(const std::vector<FT>& q, float& mul_factor, int max_leaf_check,
346  std::vector <std::pair<float, int> >& res,
347  std::unordered_set<size_t>& visited) {
348  int c = 0; // number of leaves visited
349  if (rot.size()) {
350  std::vector<FT> q_rot;
351  householder_transform(1, D, q_rot, q, rot);
352  nn(0, q_rot, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, visited);
353  } else {
354  nn(0, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, visited);
355  }
356  }
357 
361 
362 
382  void nn(size_t index, const std::vector<FT>& q_rot, const std::vector<FT>& q,
383  const float& mul_factor, std::vector <std::pair<float,
384  int> >& res, int& c, const int max_leaf_check,
385  size_t* vis,
386  Min_heap& branch,
387  const float& mindist, const size_t& tree_i,
388  const std::vector<FT>& squared_coords,
389  const std::vector<FT>& q_squared_coords, int q_index) {
390  if(c == max_leaf_check || res.front().first < mindist)
391  return;
392  if (index >= n) {
393  ++c;
394  // leaf
395  size_t point_index, leaf_index = index - n;
396  float dist;
397  for (size_t j = 0; j < leaves[leaf_index].size(); ++j) {
398  // leaves[i][j] gives you the index of the j-th point,
399  // located in the i-th leaf.
400  // (*points)[leaves[leaf_index][j]] is where the first
401  // coordinate of the point described above lies.
402  point_index = leaves[leaf_index][j] * D;
403  if(vis[leaves[leaf_index][j]])
404  continue;
405  vis[leaves[leaf_index][j]] = 1;
406  dist = Eucl_distance(*points, point_index, point_index + D, q);
407  dist *= mul_factor;
408 
409  if (dist < res.front().first) {
410  std::pop_heap (res.begin(), res.end());
411  res.pop_back();
412  res.push_back({dist, leaves[leaf_index][j]});
413  std::push_heap (res.begin(), res.end());
414  }
415  }
416  } else {
417  // node
418  FT val_q = q_rot[nodes[index].first];
419  FT val_n = nodes[index].second;
420 
421  /* Which child branch should be taken first? */
422  FT diff = val_q - val_n;
423  size_t best_child_i, other_child_i;
424  if(diff < 0) {
425  best_child_i = 2 * index + 1;
426  other_child_i = 2 * index + 2;
427  }
428  else {
429  best_child_i = 2 * index + 2;
430  other_child_i = 2 * index + 1;
431  }
432 
433  /*
434  * Partial euclidean distance, using just one dimension. This is used by the
435  * kd-tree when computing partial distances while traversing the tree.
436  *
437  * Square root is omitted for efficiency.
438  */
439  float new_dist = mindist + ((val_q - val_n) * (val_q - val_n));
440 
441  // collect branch not taken for future use
442  if(new_dist * mul_factor < res.front().first) {
443  branch.push(std::make_tuple(new_dist, other_child_i, tree_i));
444  }
445 
446  nn(best_child_i, q_rot, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, vis,
447  branch, mindist, tree_i, squared_coords, q_squared_coords, q_index);
448  }
449  }
450 
469  void nn(size_t index, const std::vector<FT>& q, const float& mul_factor,
470  std::vector <std::pair<float, int> >& res, int& c,
471  const int max_leaf_check, size_t* vis,
472  Min_heap& branch,
473  const float& mindist, const size_t& tree_i,
474  const std::vector<FT>& squared_coords,
475  const std::vector<FT>& q_squared_coords, int q_index) {
476  //edw benw
477  if(c == max_leaf_check || res.front().first < mindist)
478  return;
479  if (index >= n) {
480  ++c;
481  // leaf
482  size_t point_index, leaf_index = index - n;
483  float dist;
484  for (size_t j = 0; j < leaves[leaf_index].size(); ++j) {
485  // leaves[i][j] gives you the index of the j-th point,
486  // located in the i-th leaf.
487  // (*points)[leaves[leaf_index][j]] is where the first
488  // coordinate of the point described above lies.
489  point_index = leaves[leaf_index][j] * D;
490  //std::cout << "point_index = " << point_index/D << "\n";
491  //if(point_index/D == 4096 ||point_index/D == 3138)
492  // std::cout <<"fouuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuund\n";
493  if(vis[leaves[leaf_index][j]])
494  continue;
495  vis[leaves[leaf_index][j]] = 1;
496 
497  //dist = squared_Eucl_distance(*points, point_index, point_index + D, q);
498  //std::cout << "Normal: = " << dist << std::endl;
499  dist = squared_Eucl_distance(*points, point_index, point_index + D,
500  squared_coords[point_index/D], q,
501  q_squared_coords[q_index]);
502  //std::cout << "method2: = " << dist << std::endl;
503  dist *= mul_factor;
504 
505  if (dist < res.front().first) {
506  std::pop_heap (res.begin(), res.end());
507  res.pop_back();
508  res.push_back({dist, leaves[leaf_index][j]});
509  std::push_heap (res.begin(), res.end());
510  }
511  }
512  } else {
513  // node
514  FT val_q = q[nodes[index].first];
515  FT val_n = nodes[index].second;
516 
517  // Which child branch should we take first?
518  FT diff = val_q - val_n;
519  size_t best_child_i, other_child_i;
520  if(diff < 0) {
521  best_child_i = 2 * index + 1;
522  other_child_i = 2 * index + 2;
523  }
524  else {
525  best_child_i = 2 * index + 2;
526  other_child_i = 2 * index + 1;
527  }
528 
529  /*
530  * Partial Euclidean distance, using just one dimension. This is used by the
531  * RKD-tree when computing partial distances while traversing the tree.
532  *
533  * Square root is omitted for efficiency.
534  */
535  float new_dist = mindist + ((val_q - val_n) * (val_q - val_n));
536 
537  // collect branch not taken for future use
538  if(new_dist * mul_factor < res.front().first) {
539  branch.push(std::make_tuple(new_dist, other_child_i, tree_i));
540  }
541 
542  nn(best_child_i, q, mul_factor, res, c,
543  max_leaf_check, vis, branch, mindist, tree_i,
544  squared_coords, q_squared_coords, q_index);
545  }
546  }
547 
568  void search_nn(const std::vector<FT>& q, const float& mul_factor,
569  const int max_leaf_check,
570  std::vector <std::pair<float, int> >& res,
571  Min_heap& branch, const float& mindist,
572  const size_t node_i, const size_t& tree_i,
573  size_t* visited,
574  const std::vector<FT>& squared_coords,
575  const std::vector<FT>& q_squared_coords, int q_index) {
576  // edw benw
577  int c = 0; // number of leaves visited
578  if (rot.size()) {
579  std::vector<FT> q_rot;
580  householder_transform(1, D, q_rot, q, rot);
581  nn(node_i, q_rot, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, visited,
582  branch, mindist, tree_i, squared_coords, q_squared_coords, q_index);
583  } else {
584  nn(node_i, q, mul_factor, res, c, max_leaf_check, visited,
585  branch, mindist, tree_i, squared_coords, q_squared_coords, q_index);
586  }
587  }

593 
609  void nn(size_t index, const std::vector<FT>& q_rot, const std::vector<FT>& q,
610  const float& r_epsilon, std::vector <std::pair<int, float> >& res,
611  int& c, const int max_leaf_check, const float& r,
612  std::unordered_set<size_t>& vis) {
613  if(c == max_leaf_check)
614  return;
615  if (index >= n) {
616  ++c;
617  // leaf
618  size_t point_index, leaf_index = index - n;
619  float dist;
620  for (size_t j = 0; j < nmax; ++j) {
621  // leaves[i][j] gives you the index of the j-th point,
622  // located in the i-th leaf.
623  // (*points)[leaves[leaf_index][j]] is where the first
624  // coordinate of the point described above lies.
625  point_index = leaves[leaf_index][j] * D;
626  if(vis.find(point_index) != vis.end()) {
627  continue;
628  }
629  vis.insert(point_index);
630  dist = Eucl_distance(*points, point_index, point_index + D, q);
631 
632  if (dist < r) {
633  res.push_back({leaves[leaf_index][j], dist});
634  }
635  }
636  } else {
637  // node
638  if (q_rot[nodes[index].first] < nodes[index].second) {
639  // go to left child
640  nn(2 * index + 1, q_rot, q, r_epsilon, res, c, max_leaf_check, r, vis);
641  if (q_rot[nodes[index].first] + r_epsilon >= nodes[index].second) {
642  nn(2 * index + 2, q_rot, q, r_epsilon, res, c, max_leaf_check, r, vis);
643  }
644  } else {
645  // go to right child
646  nn(2 * index + 2, q_rot, q, r_epsilon, res, c, max_leaf_check, r, vis);
647  if (q_rot[nodes[index].first] - r_epsilon < nodes[index].second) {
648  nn(2 * index + 1, q_rot, q, r_epsilon, res, c, max_leaf_check, r, vis);
649  }
650  }
651  }
652  }
653 
668  void nn(size_t index, const std::vector<FT>& q, const float& r_epsilon,
669  std::vector <std::pair<int, float> >& res, int& c,
670  const int max_leaf_check, const float& r,
671  std::unordered_set<size_t>& vis) {
672  if(c == max_leaf_check)
673  return;
674  if (index >= n) {
675  ++c;
676  // leaf
677  size_t point_index, leaf_index = index - n;
678  float dist;
679  for (size_t j = 0; j < nmax; ++j) {
680  // leaves[i][j] gives you the index of the j-th point,
681  // located in the i-th leaf.
682  // (*points)[leaves[leaf_index][j]] is where the first
683  // coordinate of the point described above lies.
684  point_index = leaves[leaf_index][j] * D;
685  if(vis.find(point_index) != vis.end()) {
686  continue;
687  }
688  vis.insert(point_index);
689  dist = Eucl_distance(*points, point_index, point_index + D, q);
690 
691  if (dist < r) {
692  res.push_back({leaves[leaf_index][j], dist});
693  }
694  }
695  } else {
696  // node
697  if (q[nodes[index].first] < nodes[index].second) {
698  // go to left child
699  nn(2 * index + 1, q, r_epsilon, res, c, max_leaf_check, r, vis);
700  if (q[nodes[index].first] + r_epsilon >= nodes[index].second) {
701  nn(2 * index + 2, q, r_epsilon, res, c, max_leaf_check, r, vis);
702  }
703  } else {
704  // go to right child
705  nn(2 * index + 2, q, r_epsilon, res, c, max_leaf_check, r, vis);
706  if (q[nodes[index].first] - r_epsilon < nodes[index].second) {
707  nn(2 * index + 1, q, r_epsilon, res, c, max_leaf_check, r, vis);
708  }
709  }
710  }
711  }

724  void search_nn_radius(const std::vector<FT>& q, float& mul_factor, int max_leaf_check,
725  float r, std::vector <std::pair<int, float> >& res,
726  std::unordered_set<size_t>& visited) {
727  int c = 0; // number of leaves visited
728  float r_epsilon = r * mul_factor;
729  if (rot.size()) {
730  std::vector<FT> q_rot;
731  householder_transform(1, D, q_rot, q, rot);
732  nn(0, q_rot, q, r_epsilon, res, c, max_leaf_check, r, visited);
733  } else {
734  nn(0, q, r_epsilon, res, c, max_leaf_check, r, visited);
735  }
736  }
737 
743  const std::vector<FT>* get_points() {
744  return points;
745  }
746 
753  const size_t dim() {
754  return D;
755  }
756 
757  private:
761  const std::vector<FT>* points;
765  size_t D;
769  std::vector<std::vector<size_t> > leaves; // [l][nmax]
773  size_t l;
777  size_t nmax;
781  std::vector<std::pair<size_t, FT> > nodes; // [n]
785  size_t n;
789  std::vector<float> rot; // rotation vector
790 };
